title: Breathe deeply for three to five minutes.
description: Inhale and feel your chest expand. Hold the breath gingerly, like an egg in your hands. Slowly release it back into the world. Repeat. Repeat. Repeat.

title: Imagine
description: Ten minutes of constructive mediation. Close your eyes and envision a place where you want visit. Let your mind wander this place.

title: Move Your Body with Yoga
description: Ten-minute Flowing Yoga sequence.

title: Close your eyes. Take a journey.
description: Five minutes. Where do you want to be? How does it sound? How does it smell? How does it feel? Remember and reflect.

title: Window.
description: All around you is beauty, if you wish to see it. Gaze out the nearest window for five minutes and take in that beauty.

title: Plan.
description: Where have you come from? Where are you going? Spend ten minutes recalling your joys and reaffirming your ambitions.

title: Walk.
description: Choose to take a walk. Let the sights and sounds sink into your body.

title: Push-ups.
description: Do 10 pushups. Take a moment to rest. Do 10 pushups. Another rest. Do 10 more pushups.

title: Exercise.
description: Jumping jacks, one minute. Then a minute's rest. Repeat this three times.

title: Plank
description: Hold a front plank for one minute. Then hold a side plank on each side for 30 seconds.

title: Odd satisfication.
description: Treat yourself with a small distraction. Enjoy this oddly-satisfying video.

title: Rain.
description: Take a break to the sounds of a summer storm.

title: Jump!
description: Stand up, and reach as high into the sky as you can. Bend into a low squat. Leap! Repeat this five times.

title: Stand on One Leg
description: Close your eyes and stand one on leg for 30 seconds. Alternate legs and do each side twice.

title: Stretch.
description: Stand and stretch. Loosen your shoulders. Loosen your back. Slowly, but with purpose.

title: Sun-Salutation
description: Stand up straight, face the sun, and do sun salutation. These postures are good to keep the body and mind calm and healthy.

title: 8 Minute Abs
description: Sculpt those abs. Only a short time until Spring Break!

title: Brisk Walk
description: Go for a brisk walk for ten minutes.

title: Comedy show
description: Laugh with Louis CK.

title: Tai Chi
description: Do Tai Chi

title: Single-Pointed Meditation
description: Take any visual object and focus on that for 5 minutes. When your thoughts start to wander, refocus on that object.

title: analytical meditation
description: Close your eyes and take any subject of your choice. Analyze your feelings on this subject. Why you feel how you feel?
